etymology.description: 木(木) (mù, "tree") + 寸(寸) (cùn, "hand") = to plant a tree; 豆(豆) (dòu, "bean") was added later -> 壴(壴) (shù, "drum") + 寸(寸) as phonetic
etymology.interpretation: Originally, 木(木) (mù, "tree") combined with 寸(寸) (cùn, "hand") represented the action of planting a tree. Over time, 豆(豆) (dòu, "bean") was incorporated, evolving into 壴(壴) (shù, "drum"), fusing the representations and leading to some misinterpretation as 壴 plus 寸.
